<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Helmsman's Recourse](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1858)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Meteor Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=13)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This [standard-grade duskwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2815) [meteor shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=13) (Hardness 7, HP 28, BT 14) is a wheel from a ship. While wielding the shield, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) and to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39).

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per hour;  **Requirements** You're in a body of water; **Effect** For 10 minutes, you don't sink if you haven't succeeded at a Swim action on a turn, and if you're submerged, you automatically ascend 10 feet at the end of your turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Price** 625 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The shield has Hardness 8, HP 60, and BT 30, and when you Activate the shield, it casts [_water walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=371) on you.
